Text.Name: Item_Dice
Text.Desc: A pair of dice that can be used to eliminate boredom and improve mood when one is free, but they will hinder work efficiency.

Text.Name: Item_SmallBell
Text.Desc: A small bell, taking it with you improves your mood, as well as attracts the attention of others, making them more willing to communicate with you.

Text.Name: Item_Bracelet
Text.Desc: A pair of bracelets, wearing them makes you more attractive.

Text.Name: Item_Handkerchief
Text.Desc: A handkerchief, carrying it makes you a person of manners in the eyes of others.

Text.Name: Item_PerfumeBag
Text.Desc: A small bag of fragrant herbs and spices, it improves one's Mental State when worn by an inner disciple.

Text.Name: Item_WhiteHair
Text.Desc: A collection of poems with a strong sense of sorrow. The carrier's hair will become white due to the book's influence and diffuse a melancholic vibe, which makes one feel attractive.

Text.Name: Item_LunHui_PerfectWorld
Text.Desc: A box from another world. By immersing one's mind into it, one can play an interesting and touching game.

Text.Name: Item_LunHui_QiYuanZhiXin
Text.Desc: Treasure that manifested into existence by the mortals' prayers and wishes for happiness.

Text.Name: Item_LunHui_DongFangHeShenZhen
Text.Desc: This object was originally a sword immortal's Artifact of choice. Although it lost all its power in the process of reincarnation with its master, its extraordinary essence still remains.

Text.Name: Item_MuBai_BaiYuShi
Text.Desc: A piece of white jade stone left by the Immortal Pearlwood. While looking ordinary, it can greatly improve the Natural Resilience of the wearer.

Text.Name: Item_QingLianShan_SiXiang
Text.Desc: A mysterious diagram left by the Immortal Caerulea with great power. Carrier of the painting can utilize local Qi energy and the rotation power of the four seasons in the Boundless Universe to deceive the way of Heaven for 9 years, being immune from Heavenly Tribulation. If the painting scroll is unequipped during this process, the Heavenly Tribulation will arrive immediately.

Text.Name: Item_Other_PuppetTest
Text.Desc: A Vessel. It is said that there is a secret method of endowing a Vessel with Blessing recorded in Sixteen Supreme Steps Law.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_RabbitLuck
Text.Desc: It is said to bring good fortune.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_WolfAtk
Text.Desc: An intact Wolf Demon fang full of negative energy. Wearing it greatly increase a character's Artifact damage.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_SnakeHanLin
Text.Desc: Scale which has a concentration of Yin Qi of a Snake Demon. Allows one to be invulnerable to high temperature and having a pristine Mental State.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_BearPiMao
Text.Desc: The finest hairs from a Bear Demon's neck, with boisterous Yang Qi dwelling within it. Wearing it allows one to be invulnerable to low temperature and increases cultivation speed.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_TurtleKe
Text.Desc: The very sturdy shell of a Giant Turtle, wearing it could hugely increase one's resistance to Qi damage.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_TigerZhui
Text.Desc: Bone slice of a tiger Yaoguai resplendent with authoritative power. Wearing it improves one's Charisma and Attainment.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_CattleJiao
Text.Desc: The tempered hard horn of a Yaoguai bull. Wearing it improves Constitution.

Text.Name: Item_Yao_ChickenGuan
Text.Desc: Precious crown created by concentrating Solar Essence on the top of the head of a chicken Yaoguai. Wearing it improves one's Perception and Intelligence.

Text.Name: Item_StoneCutter
Text.Desc: Knife with a very dull edge, originally intended for jade mining. Due to its nature as a blunt instrument, it can build very fast.

Text.Name: Item_SewingDefender
Text.Desc: Although looks like a simple bracer, it can speed up sewing work by utilizing one's elbow strength.

Text.Name: Item_MillVell
Text.Desc: Since no one will recognize you once you covered your face, you can knead the dough or speed up other handcrafting works however you want, as no one can tell whether you did it well or not.

Text.Name: Item_Sys_RanSeYu
Text.Desc: A peculiar kind of jade. Once activated with spell, it can be turned into smoke and attached to a person without being detected. But the caster of the spell will be able trace it.
